TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannelCredentials

summary.span: Una interfaz que permite la configuración de ciertas características de seguridad en un proxy del servicio.

span.span: An interface that allows the setting of certain security features on a service proxy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Los clientes no administrados usan el moniker del "servicio" para acceder a los servicios [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)].Unmanaged clients use the "service" moniker to access [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] services. Estos clientes están sujetos al modelo de seguridad WCF en lugar de con el modelo de seguridad de COM.These clients are subject to the WCF security model rather than the COM security model. La interfaz se proporciona para especificar las credenciales del canal.The interface is provided to specify channel credentials. Esto es necesario porque el moniker COM no puede tener acceso el modelo de objetos de seguridad administrado de WCF.This is required because the COM moniker cannot access the managed WCF security object model. No es legal llamar métodos en la interfaz `IChannelCredentials` una vez creado el canal.It is not legal to call methods on the `IChannelCredentials` interface after the channel is created. Esto se debe a que [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] no permite cambiar la configuración de seguridad en un canal ya abierto.This is because [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] does not support changing security settings on an already opened channel. Cuando el cliente de moniker de servicio obtiene un proxy, el canal no está todavía creado.When the service moniker client obtains a proxy, the channel is not yet created. De este modo, el cliente debe llamar a los métodos `IChannelCredentials` antes de invocar el método de servicio.Thus, the client must call `IChannelCredentials` methods prior to invoking the service method. Si el cliente llama a un método `IChannelCredentials` una vez invocado el método de servicio, se produce la excepción RPC_E_TOO_LATE.If the client calls an `IChannelCredentials` method after the service method is invoked, the exception RPC_E_TOO_LATE is thrown. ## Examples ``` monString = "service:mexAddress=http://localhost:8000/ServiceModelSamples/Service?wsdl" monString = monString + ", address=http://localhost:8000/ServiceModelSamples/Service" monString = monString + ", binding=BasicHttpBinding_ICalculator, bindingNamespace=http://Microsoft.ServiceModel.Samples" monString = monString + ", contract=ICalculator, contractNamespace=http://Microsoft.ServiceModel.Samples" Set monikerProxy = GetObject(monString) 'Set the Service Certificate. monikerProxy.ChannelCredentials.SetServiceCertificateAuthentication "CurrentUser", "NoCheck", "PeerOrChainTrust" monikerProxy.ChannelCredentials.SetDefaultServiceCertificateFromStore "CurrentUser", "TrustedPeople", "FindBySubjectName", "localhost" 'Set the Client Certificate. monikerProxy.ChannelCredentials.SetClientCertificateFromStoreByName "CN=client.com", "CurrentUser", "My" MsgBox monikerProxy.Add(3, 4) ```

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetClientCertificateFromFile (string fileName, string password, string keyStorageFlags);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetClientCertificateFromFile(string fileName, string password, string keyStorageFlags) cil managed
Public Sub SetClientCertificateFromFile (fileName As String, password As String, keyStorageFlags As String)
public: void SetClientCertificateFromFile(System::String ^ fileName, System::String ^ password, System::String ^ keyStorageFlags);

param.name: fileName
param.span: Nombre del archivo que contiene el certificado.

span.span: File name that contains the certificate.

param.name: keyStorageFlags
param.span: Marcas de almacenamiento para el certificado.

summary.span: Recupera un certificado desde un archivo y lo agrega a las credenciales del cliente.

span.span: Retrieves a certificate from a file and adds it to the client credentials.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando `keyStorageFlags` está definido como una cadena vacía o nula, se utilizan las marcas de almacenamiento predeterminadas.When `keyStorageFlags` is set to null or an empty string, the default storage flags are used.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetClientCertificateFromStore (string storeLocation, string storeName, string findType, object findValue);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetClientCertificateFromStore(string storeLocation, string storeName, string findType, object findValue) cil managed
Public Sub SetClientCertificateFromStore (storeLocation As String, storeName As String, findType As String, findValue As Object)
public: void SetClientCertificateFromStore(System::String ^ storeLocation, System::String ^ storeName, System::String ^ findType, System::Object ^ findValue);

summary.span: Recupera un certificado desde un almacén de certificados y lo agrega a las credenciales del cliente.

span.span: Retrieves a certificate from a certificate store and adds it to the client credentials.

span.span: Retrieves a certificate from a certificate store by name and adds it to the client credentials.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetDefaultServiceCertificateFromFile(string fileName, string password, string keyStorageFlags) cil managed
Public Sub SetDefaultServiceCertificateFromFile (fileName As String, password As String, keyStorageFlags As String)
public: void SetDefaultServiceCertificateFromFile(System::String ^ fileName, System::String ^ password, System::String ^ keyStorageFlags);

param.name: password
param.span: Contraseña para el archivo de certificados.

param.name: keyStorageFlags
param.span: Marcas de almacenamiento para el certificado.

summary.span: Recupera un certificado de un archivo y lo agrega a las credenciales de servicio como el certificado predeterminado.

span.span: Retrieves a certificate from a file and adds it to the service credentials as the default certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando `keyStorageFlags` está definido como una cadena vacía o nula, se utilizan las marcas de almacenamiento predeterminadas.When `keyStorageFlags` is set to null or an empty string, the default storage flags are used.
